channel.title: Sacred Island 718 ~ Aiming high! || Economy
channel.description:
[CENTER] [SIZE=7][FONT=Arial Black][B]Sacred Island 718[/B][/FONT][/SIZE]
[b]Forums: [/b][url=http://sacredisland718.com]http://sacredisland718.com[/url] [b]Highscores: [/b][url=http://sacredisland718.com/highscores/]http://sacredisland718.com/highscores/[/url] [b]Vote4Rewards: [/b][url=http://sacredisland718.com/vote/]http://sacredisland718.com/vote/[/url] [b]Webclient: [/b][url=http://sacredisland718.com/play/webclient.html]http://sacredisland718.com/play/webclient.html[/url] [b]Desktop Client: [/b][url=http://sacredisland718.com/play/client.jar]http://sacredisland718.com/play/client.jar[/url]
[U][B]Why should you join?[/B][/U]
Welcome to Sacred Island 718, we decided to make this server after seeing lots of RSPS players out there that just can't seem to find what they are looking for, and they get bored quickly playing other servers because the fun only lasts so long. This server is designed for you to be able to play for hours and hours on end without getting bored. We have a huge variety of things for you to do while you play. The economy had been well thought-out to make sure that our economy works well, and is long-lasting.
[B][U]Features:[/U][/B]
[ul][li]Vote4Rewards[/li] [li]Highscores[/li] [li]Running on VPS[/li] [li]100% Godwars Bosses including Nex[/li] [li]Tons of Bosses to spend hours at[/li] [li]Lots of 100% Minigames including Duel Arena, Fight Caves, Fight Kiln, Dominion Tower and more![/li] [li]24/7 Uptime[/li] [li].com domain name[/li] [li]Great community & Friendly staff[/li] [li]Great and well thought-out economy[/li] [li]Lots of skills to enjoy and train![/li] [li]100% Summoning w/ Summoning Training![/li] [li]Developers that will listen to your ideas & suggestions[/li] [li]Loyalty Points & Shop[/li] [li]Squeal of Fortune[/li] [li]Construction Training[/li] [li]Tons of things to do so that you never get bored! Hours and hours on end of gameplay![/li] [li]Join now to find out the rest of the unique features for yourself![/B][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/report1.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/report2.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/squealoffortune.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/highscores.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/vote4cash.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/advancedbarbagil.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/agility.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/farming.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/woodcutting.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/bonesonaltar.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/construction.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/packyak.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/summoning.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/summoningoptions.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/summoningscrolls.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/bob.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/fishing.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/armadyl.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/bandos.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/nex.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/corp.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/kbd.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/frosts.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/barrows.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/clanwars.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/fightcaves.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/changeclothes.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/loyaltyshop.png[/img] [IMG]http://sacredisland718.com/server/voteshop.png[/img]
[B]Join now to find out everything else for yourself! Our community will treat you well and we promise you won't regret joining![/B] [/CENTER]

item.title: Sacred Island 718 ~ Aiming high! || Economy
item.dc:creator: @kiwi2 kiwi.
item.description:
@kiwi2 wrote:

Bump! updates daily! Lots of new unique things being added ! Definitely try us out we promise you won’t regret it! Forums are currently down, but you can still play using http://sacredisland718.com/play/webclient.html or at http://sacredisland718.com/play/client.jar !

Read full topic

@kiwi2 wrote:

[CENTER]
[SIZE=7][FONT=Arial Black]Sacred Island 718[/FONT][/SIZE]

Forums: http://sacredisland718.com
Highscores: http://sacredisland718.com/highscores/
Vote4Rewards: http://sacredisland718.com/vote/
Webclient: http://sacredisland718.com/play/webclient.html
Desktop Client: http://sacredisland718.com/play/client.jar

Why should you join?

Welcome to Sacred Island 718, we decided to make this server after seeing lots of RSPS players out there that just can’t seem to find what they are looking for, and they get bored quickly playing other servers because the fun only lasts so long. This server is designed for you to be able to play for hours and hours on end without getting bored. We have a huge variety of things for you to do while you play. The economy had been well thought-out to make sure that our economy works well, and is long-lasting.

Features:

[ul][li]Vote4Rewards[/li]
[li]Highscores[/li]
[li]Running on VPS[/li]
[li]100% Godwars Bosses including Nex[/li]
[li]Tons of Bosses to spend hours at[/li]
[li]Lots of 100% Minigames including Duel Arena, Fight Caves, Fight Kiln, Dominion Tower and more![/li]
[li]24/7 Uptime[/li]

[li]Tons of things to do so that you never get bored! Hours and hours on end of gameplay![/li]
[li]Join now to find out the rest of the unique features for yourself![/B][/li][/ul]





























Join now to find out everything else for yourself! Our community will treat you well and we promise you won’t regret joining!
